rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with decorative facade, adhering to Vastu guidelines. Incorporates a reception area and a foyer.
Open concept space combining living room, dining area, and kitchen; ample natural light from north windowed openings ensuring positive energy flow.
Primary bedroom with a spacious North-facing balcony, aligning Vastu principles for prosperity. Includes walk-in closet and attached bathroom.
Secondary bedroom with a private balcony oriented to the north. Adjacent to a shared ensuite bathroom.
